name: A World Abandoned - Playtesting
description:
PLEASE DELETE YOUR SAVE DATA WHEN PLAYING ON A NEW VERSION ! You want to give feedback, point out bugs or just wanna stay up to date with development ?  Join the discord : https://discord.gg/Xwkghfr

CHANGELOG:

Pre-Alpha - 0.02:

- Sound for the energy blaster implemented

- Health bars for enemies

- time slows when killing enemies

- new music

- some changes in level design

- combo system has been altered

-  bug fixes for abilities

Pre Alpha - 0.01:

- contains most of the starting area

- the normal path to the boss fight is fully implemented

- 3 optional secrets holding (spoilers) : a health upgrade , EXP, Blaster Upgrade

- some of the alternative ways to get to the boss are still not finished but the level design is done

- WIP areas are locked with a 1 tile wall

If you encounter bugs that have to do with the settings, try deleting your save data.

on windows :

- open %appdata%

    -> godot

          -> user appdata

                 -> A World Abandoned

delete all files
